caption.p: (a) PL spectra of the white light generated by employing color conversion layers with different amounts of PVP/N-CDot fibers coupled to a 450 nm blue LED chip. (b) The calculated CRI, CCT, LER and luminous flux values of the corresponding PVP/N-CDot fibers. (c) The CIE color coordinates of the white light generated by the WLED comprising varying amounts of the PVP/N-CDot fibers.
